classDetails.title: Yoga for Beginners
classDetails.summary: A beginner-friendly yoga class designed to improve flexibility and mindfulness.
description: This class is perfect for those new to yoga and aims to increase flexibility, strength, and mindfulness.
Guided step-by-step instructions help you build a solid foundation in yoga techniques.

faq.question: Do I need prior yoga experience?
faq.answer: No, this course is designed for beginners with no prior experience.

faq.question: What should I bring to the class?
faq.answer: A yoga mat, comfortable clothing, and water are recommended.

faq.question: Is the class suitable for people with injuries?
faq.answer: Please consult your physician and notify the instructor before joining.

classDetails.title: Advanced Coding Bootcamp
classDetails.summary: An intensive course for experienced programmers to enhance their coding skills.
description: This bootcamp is designed for developers seeking to deepen their understanding of coding and development practices.
Learn advanced techniques, frameworks, and best practices in a collaborative and immersive environment.

faq.question: What prior knowledge is required?
faq.answer: You should have at least 1-2 years of programming experience.

faq.question: What programming languages will be covered?
faq.answer: The bootcamp covers Python, JavaScript, and popular frameworks like React.

faq.question: Are job placement services included?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer resume reviews and job placement assistance after the course.

classDetails.title: Creative Writing Workshop
classDetails.summary: A workshop focused on improving storytelling and writing skills.
description: This workshop helps writers refine their storytelling abilities and master narrative techniques.
Interactive sessions and personalized feedback ensure continuous improvement.

faq.question: What genres of writing are covered?
faq.answer: The workshop focuses on fiction, non-fiction, and poetry.

faq.question: Is this suitable for beginners?
faq.answer: Yes, we welcome writers at all skill levels.

faq.question: Will I get personalized feedback?
faq.answer: Yes, every participant receives individual feedback from the instructor.

classDetails.title: Photography for Beginners
classDetails.summary: Learn the basics of photography and capture beautiful images.
description: This course is ideal for aspiring photographers who want to learn camera settings, lighting, and composition.
Hands-on activities help students develop essential photography skills.

faq.question: Do I need a professional camera?
faq.answer: No, you can start with any camera, including a smartphone.

faq.question: Will there be outdoor photography sessions?
faq.answer: Yes, the course includes outdoor practice sessions.

faq.question: Are there group activities?
faq.answer: Yes, we encourage collaborative projects and group learning.

classDetails.title: Business Management Essentials
classDetails.summary: A comprehensive course on leadership, strategy, and business management.
description: Learn to develop effective strategies and improve leadership skills to excel in the business world.
This course covers key topics like organizational structure, financial planning, and risk management.

faq.question: Do I need prior business experience?
faq.answer: No, this course is designed for beginners and intermediate learners.

faq.question: What topics are covered?
faq.answer: Topics include leadership, financial planning, strategy, and risk management.

faq.question: Are there networking opportunities?
faq.answer: Yes, the course includes online networking sessions.
